result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.descr: Pet for appointment counsel,affidavit of indigency

records.addlTxt:
Clerk Marisa. 
Case called: 9:47 am 
INCLUDES 21CM717, 22CM305, 22CM324, 22CM335, & 22CM356. 
Deft does NOT appear. 
Court denies apptment of Counsel. 
Adj: 9:48 am 

cc: Br. 4

ADDRESS INFO for Paul R. Zeise
Current: 734 S 1st Ave, Wausau, WI 54401 United States  (Effective: 07-06-2022)
Prior: 600 1/2 E 1st St, Merrill, WI 54452

Includes cases 22CM356, 22CM335, 22CM324, 22CM305, & 21CM717. No contact with victim(s): N.O.; Contact includes direct personal or physical and indirect contact by phone, in writing of any kind, entry to the person's residence or place of employment together with contacts through other persons.  Contact, however, may be made through the defendant's attorney. No driving without valid DL. Report to ATTIC Corrections Services within one business day of release. Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level 4 supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.

Case Called: 2:48 pm
INCLUDES 22CM356, 22CM335, 22CM324, 22CM305, 21CM717. 
Clerk: Kassidi.
State appears by ADA Sid Brubacher in person for ADA Lacey Coonen. Defendant appears in custody, via Zoom Video, and with Atty Krista Cannon in person.
COURT QUASHES WARRANTS. 

VRCW.  
Reading Waived.  Reserve Jurisdiction. 
Court questions deft re: complaint and rights.
Advised Right of Counsel. 
PLEA:  NOT GUILTY.

BOND: 
$2,000 Signature Bond to cover all files.

CONDITIONS: 
- No contact with victim(s): N.O.
- No driving without valid DL. 
-Report to ATTIC Corrections Services within one business day of release. Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level 4 supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening. 

DATES:
PTC 07/19 @ 3:30 pm

Branch 4 Files.

Adjourned: 2:51 pm
$30.00 warrant fee. Brought to jail on 07/03/22 by Wausau PD.

Clerk: Becca. 
Case Called: 11:09 am. 
***UNMONITORED DAR*** 
INCLUDES: 22CM335 & 22CM356.
BRANCH 4 CASES.

State appears by ADA Kyle Mayo for ADA Lacey Coonen. 
Defendant fails to appear.

State requests bench warrant due to non-appearance.
COURT finds proper notice given in re: todays hearing.
COURT ORDERS: BWA $500.00 (to cover both cases). 

Adjourned: 11:10 am.

Clerk: Becca. 
Case Called: 9:18 am. 
***UNMONITORED DAR*** 
INCLUDES: 22CM305, 22CM335, 22CM324, 22CM356 & 21CM717.
BRANCH 4 CASES.

Defendant fails to appear.

BENCH WARRANT in 21CM717 to continue.
